ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: bard seeks advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for all the great feedback everyone.  I have decided not to have EQSS host the site.  The site will be moving in the near future though as the friend I
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for all the great feedback everyone. I have decided not to have EQSS
host the site. The site will be moving in the near future though as the
friend I am mooching webspace from is going to close the account soon. I
will be getting a domain name and moving it to another web hosting service
soon (in the next 4-8 weeks). I will give plenty of notice before the move
:)

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: RKR [mailto:rkroads@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 24, 2000 2:17 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: bard seeks advice
>
>
> Rokenn I like it where it is. A link from them to you might
> be nice, but host? Hmm
> I agree with the others. They strike me as being often out of date.
>
> We have a link on our guild page to your site. I frequently
> tell bards about it
> because it is such a fantastic resource. Kudos again to you
> and all the
> contributors.
>
> Whatever you decide, it would be nice to avoid a ripple of
> broken links if possible
> =).
>
> Maravana Vireo
> 51 (very very soon to be 52 finally ;P)
> Jus Divinum www.jusdivinum.com
> Mithaniel Marr
>
>
